comments: The manuscript for Salvia in FRPS was prepared before 1964 but wasn't published until 1977 due to the occurrence of Chairman Mao's Great Cultural Revolution between these dates.
examples: Chienodoxa Y.Z.Sun in Acta Phytotax. Sin. 1: 22 (1951). Salvia nanchuanensis Y.Z.Sun in Fl. Reipubl. Popularis Sin. 66: 582 (1977), as 'Sun, Hsiung t'Sai'
